ygData.subject: Bad Metal
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Dcoburn, Abominus isnt to bright, so I dont know if he would notice. He ussually keeps fighting until all potential enemies are dead, or he is ordered.

OOC: Dcoburn, Abominus isnt to bright, so I dont know if he would 
notice. He ussually keeps fighting until all potential enemies are 
dead, or he is ordered. Big post here people. Also sorry Soulstice, 
since you didnt post with him in a while, I didnt know you wanted 
something to do. Dcoburn, what happened to Surgital ?

BIC:

Megatron nodded to Autofire, "Ah yessss, about your payment, I will 
talk to you about that when you return with the potential soldier. 
There will also be a bonus involved," He then turned his attention to 
Dive-Bomb, "Dive-Bomb, Razorclaw can handle that, acompany Autofire 
here," he then turned towards the base. "Triggerhappy, Skullgrin, get 
out here, I have a new job for you to do," He then turned to Cepta, 
"Ahhh yesss, Welcome to the Decepticons, I am Megatron" he said in an 
awfully ellegant and ettiquette, "Would you like a tour of the base?" 
He asks.

---------------------------------------------------------

Firedrill looked at First Aid funny, like he should know him, "It's me 
Firedrill" he said.

Cliffjumper first noticed Halucigen leave, and then turned around, 
Abominus was big time. He new that the gestalt fighting him would need 
to turn it up a notch to take him out. He still wasnt sure what to do, 
so he walked towards Beachcomber again.

OOC: Thanks Kslaw, I was a bit confused.
BIC:

Headstrong loomed over First-Aid, "Well well *snort* if it isnt the 
pacifist, you Protectobots sure can't cut it can you" he mocked, as he 
raised his sword for another strike. Just then Firedrill leapt into 
him, shoulder first. The force of the tackle sent them both back. 
Firedrill landed to his feet in front of the Predacon, "Just like a 
Decepticon to attack a defensless robot" he spat, showing discust. 
"I'll tach you what a Decepticon is like *snort*" Headstrong retorted 
furiously.
